item.title: Interface Design Guidelines
item.description: Creating a new app or website can be a lot of fun. You think about the concept, research different design approaches and let your creativity take charge. When your creation is complete, you look at it and say, ‘I nailed it!’ But, did you? Just because you might have a killer design for your product, it doesn’t mean that it will be used by the same form by anyone. Therefore, you need to consider some interface design guidelines while working on your project.
